curam.util.resources

Interface EnvironmentConstants.ActionMenus

  • Enclosing interface:
    EnvironmentConstants

    public static interface EnvironmentConstants.ActionMenus
    These settings enable a system administrator to configure action menus (tab, page, list) to have visibly surfaceable menu items outside of the overflow menu icon.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String kActionMenusEnabledInlineForList
      Enables list actions to be displayed inline on the list row and immediately available to users.
      static java.lang.String kActionMenusEnabledInlineForPage
      Enables page actions to be displayed inline on the page and immediately available to users.
      static java.lang.String kActionMenusEnabledInlineForTab
      Enables tab actions to be displayed inline on the tab action menu and immediately available to users.
      static java.lang.String kActionMenusMaxInlinedForList
      Specifies the maximum number of action menu items to display inline on the list row.
      static java.lang.String kActionMenusMaxInlinedForPage
      Specifies the maximum number of action menu items to display inline on the page.
      static java.lang.String kActionMenusMaxInlinedForTab
      Specifies the maximum number of action menu items to display inline on a tab.

    • Field Detail

      • kActionMenusEnabledInlineForPage

        static final java.lang.String kActionMenusEnabledInlineForPage
        Enables page actions to be displayed inline on the page and immediately available to users. By default, the value is false. When set to true, one page action is displayed inline by default. Actions that are not displayed inline overflow into the page action menu. Property name : curam.actionmenus.display-inline.enabled.page
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kActionMenusMaxInlinedForPage

        static final java.lang.String kActionMenusMaxInlinedForPage
        Specifies the maximum number of action menu items to display inline on the page. Actions that are not displayed inline overflow into the page action menu. A maximum value of 4 is recommended. Set a value of 0 to place all page actions in the page actions menu. Property name : curam.actionmenus.max-inline-items.page
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kActionMenusEnabledInlineForList

        static final java.lang.String kActionMenusEnabledInlineForList
        Enables list actions to be displayed inline on the list row and immediately available to users. By default, the value is false. When set to true, one list action is displayed inline by default. Actions that are not displayed inline overflow into the list action menu. Property name : curam.actionmenus.display-inline.enabled.list
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kActionMenusMaxInlinedForList

        static final java.lang.String kActionMenusMaxInlinedForList
        Specifies the maximum number of action menu items to display inline on the list row. Actions that are not displayed inline overflow into the list action menu. A maximum value of 2 is recommended. Set a value of 0 to place all list actions in the list actions menu. Property name : curam.actionmenus.max-inline-items.list
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kActionMenusEnabledInlineForTab

        static final java.lang.String kActionMenusEnabledInlineForTab
        Enables tab actions to be displayed inline on the tab action menu and immediately available to users. By default, the value is false. When set to true, two tab actions are displayed inline by default. Actions that are not displayed inline overflow into the tab action menu. Property name : curam.actionmenus.display-inline.enabled.tab
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kActionMenusMaxInlinedForTab

        static final java.lang.String kActionMenusMaxInlinedForTab
        Specifies the maximum number of action menu items to display inline on a tab. Actions that are not displayed inline overflow into the tab action menu. A maximum value of 4 is recommended. Set a value of 0 to place all list actions in the tab action menu. Property name : curam.actionmenus.max-inline-items.tab
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
